lead_paragraph: Michigan’s Senate completed legislation authorizing $30 million in supplemental aid to help Flint residents pay their water bills.

headline.print_headline: Michigan: State Senate Approves Aid to Help Flint Residents Pay Water Bills
headline.main: Michigan: State Senate Approves Aid to Help Flint Residents Pay Water Bills

snippet: Michigan’s Senate completed legislation authorizing $30 million in supplemental aid to help Flint residents pay their water bills.
abstract: Michigan State Senate unanimously approves legislation authorizing $30 million in supplemental aid to help residents of Flint, Mich, pay their water bills while officials continue to struggle to solve lead-contaminated water crisis.
